author: jerenkrantz
msg: mod_dav mirroring: Tell mod_proxy this is a reverse proxy connection; loosen up
the string matching to not just rewrite special URIs.
Somewhere in the httpd 2.1->2.2 lifecycle, forward proxies were disabled by
default.  Since we are explicitly controlling the URL that will receive the
request, this is more of a reverse proxy situation - so tell that to mod_proxy.
Hence, we'll now work without ForwardRequests * activated.
(dav_svn__proxy_merge_fixup): Indicate that we want a reverse proxy worker.
restriction on what paths will match.

author: kfogel
msg: as this file was in CRLF format.

author: hwright
msg: Const-ify the ranges_to_merge parameter of svn_client_merge_peg3().
